title: Patch Notes
body:
I cant seem to find the patch notes for patch 4.22 anywhere. 
can someone help?

replies.body: but I see people telling me they just now got rid of Ward Hoping so I assume that the patch notes are out
thank you for telling ima go cry now

oh well now I just feel stupid thank you guys for telling me.
:)
Yeah, it's not out yet and most of those things aren't real.
